name: Plants vs. Ants
description:
Defend your farm against the invading ants using your magic plants!

How to play: 

* Click on the signs with the down arrow and choose a plant;

* Wait for the cooldown to place the same type of plant again.

Submitted for the Global Game Jam 2023

Credits:

Bruno Santos Araújo - Code, Game Design

John Silva - Art, UI, Game Design

Background music: https://www.playonloop.com
